Warehouse Chief Croop:
I am Warehouse Chief Croop of the Iron Gate Guild here in the Town of Oren. I suppose my main job these days is dealing with the Scavengers who come to see me. Are you here because you want to become a Bounty Hunter, too?
Listen to information about second class transfer.
